problem_names: lemma xor_distr_R [simp]:"(A \<oplus> B) \<oplus> C = A \<oplus> (B \<oplus> C)"
translations:
proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. A \<oplus> (B \<oplus> C) = (A \<and> \<not> B \<and> \<not> C) \<or>
    A \<and> B \<and> C \<or>
    \<not> A \<and> B \<and> \<not> C \<or>
    \<not> A \<and> \<not> B \<and> C
lemma xor_distr_R [simp]:"(A \<oplus> B) \<oplus> C = A \<oplus> (B \<oplus> C)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. A \<oplus> B \<oplus> C = A \<oplus> (B \<oplus> C)
